name: 3D Sniper City Hunt Shooter
description:
Crime bosses, fugitives, bank robbers... the city is infested with criminals that will continue doing evil if you don't stop them!

As a police sniper, you will receive missions in which you will have to eliminate the criminals that have been spotted in the city. Aim carefully! If you mistake the shot, the criminal will run away.

Pull the trigger and watch your bullet hit the targets in slow motion camera view! Try shooting targets in the most vulnarable spots; headshots are the best!

By completing your missions you will earn coins with which you can customize and improve your weapon. You can also purchase better rifles that are more steady, provide better aiming and spend less time to reload.

FEATURES:
- 40 missions with different targets: will you be able to find them all in time?
- Help button (?) to remind you what your target looks like in case you forget.
- Limited time for missions: eliminate your target before it escapes from your range, or your mission will fail!
- Complete reward system: earn coins and upgrade your weapon!
- Customize your weapon features: Damage, Range, Stability, Zoom, Clip Size, Reloading time
- Upgrade your arsenal: 5 awesome weapons available
- Multiple camera view and slow motion view and effects
- Realistic physics and shooting effects

If you are a fan of FPS games, you will absolutely love 3D Sniper City Hunt Shooter, one of the most addicting and fun shooting games ever!


Disclaimer
3D Sniper City Hunt Shooter is a free game, however it includes mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep it away from your kids, children and younger boys
